Luke Skywalker.Action: Calls Han and addresses him as 'old buddy' in a friendly manner, shows concern by checking for life readings on the ice planet
Conducts a reconnaissance patrol on his Tauntaun, effectively using electrobinoculars to spot crash smoke and reports findings through comlink, showing situational awareness and communication skills.
Does not detect any life forms during patrol and correctly reports zero life signs, indicating attentiveness and adherence to mission objectives.
Pats his nervous Tauntaun to calm it, speaking gently and showing care.
Takes initiative to investigate a meteorite nearby, tries to adjust his device, attempts to react when attacked by the Wampa.
Fails to avoid or prevent the Wampa attack, is quickly subdued and dragged away, unable to defend himself effectively.
Has not returned to base and failed to check in as expected, causing concern among others.
Uses intense concentration and persistence to escape a dangerous situation, showing resourcefulness and calm under pressure.
Focuses on survival and self-rescue without immediate display of outreach or concern for others in the excerpt.
Struggles to survive alone in harsh conditions, showing perseverance.
No direct interaction or communication shown with others in this excerpt.
Weakly tries to call out to Ben Kenobi, showing trust and openness to guidance.
Passively lies unconscious in the snow, unable to help himself or others.
Persists despite being nearly unconscious in extreme conditions, weakly tries to communicate with Ben Kenobi, showing determination to continue his mission.
Falls unconscious in the snow and is unable to protect himself from the environment, requiring rescue.
Repeatedly calls out to Ben (Obi-Wan) and Yoda while unconscious and in distress, showing trust and connection to mentors.
Unable to act due to unconsciousness; moaning and barely responsive while Han acts to save him.
Sits up weak but smiling, thanks Han sincerely for helping him.
Recovers from severe wounds sustained in Wampa's attack, shows resilience and strength despite injuries.
Appears weak initially but maintains a positive attitude by smiling, indicating mental strength.
Responds to Han and Leia's banter with a smug grin and relaxed posture after being kissed by Leia.
Tells Chewie to take care of himself and pats him on the arm, receives a hug in return.
Shares a caring, silent communication with Han, wishing him safety and happiness.
Decides to leave heavy equipment behind to prioritize evacuating smaller modules, showing quick practical decision-making under pressure.

Shows clear concern for others (Chewie, Han) and exchanges meaningful silent communication, indicating emotional intelligence, though this is less directly related to competence in skill or task execution.
Responds calmly and confidently to Han's inquiry about his well-being despite stressful circumstances.
Engages warmly with his gunner Dack, asking how he feels and encouraging him.
Walks confidently to his snowspeeder and exchanges encouraging words with his gunner before battle.
Quietly acknowledges shared determination with Dack, 'I know what you mean.'
Quickly straps into his snowspeeder and responds promptly to the call to engage the Imperial walkers, showing readiness and composure under pressure.
Encourages team with 'All right, boys, keep tight now.'
Reassures Dack: 'Steady, Dack. Attack pattern delta. Go now!'
Checks on teammate: 'Hobbie, you still with me?'
Communicates clearly with squadron, organizes attack pattern 'delta', and directs teammates confidently during battle.
Skillfully pilots speeder close through walker legs, demonstrating precise control under pressure.
Engages enemy walker directly, attempts a high-risk attack maneuver.
Checks on Dack's condition after a heavy attack, expresses concern.
Focuses on tactical instructions to his team to try to stop the Imperial walkers.
Recognizes the tank armor is too strong for blasters and quickly adapts by instructing the team to use harpoons and tow cables to stop the walkers.
Maintains control and focus while flying a speeder under heavy fire, directing his gunner and preparing for the tow cable shot.
Checks on his injured gunner after intense combat and reacts with concern, showing awareness of his team's status.
Communicates clearly and cooperatively over the comlink, coordinates with Wedge after losing his gunner, offers to cover and instructs the next steps.
Effectively communicates strategic instructions over comlink under pressure and coordinates team actions during battle.
Loses his gunner early in combat, indicating a loss of personnel support.
Checks on Rogue Two's status over comlink, expresses concern, offers to cover and coordinate.
Urgently communicates 'Hobbie, I've been hit!' showing concern for team members and reliance on others.
Struggles with controls of his damaged speeder under attack, communicates situation calmly over comlink.
Bravely runs beneath the giant Imperial walker to attach a harpoon cable, climbs up to sabotage it, and successfully disables the walker despite grave danger.
Waves farewell to fellow pilots and acknowledges their good luck wishes with a smile and nod.
Reassures Artoo not to worry about the delayed takeoff, speaking kindly and patiently.
Makes the unilateral decision to change course away from the others without prior discussion, disregarding Artoo's concerns.
Waves farewell to fellow pilots and boards his X-wing preparing for takeoff calmly.
Confidently takes control of his fighter and initiates a steep turn to set a new course independently.
Decides not to regroup with others and instead navigates toward the Dagobah system on his own judgment.
Chuckles and smiles at Artoo's frustrated whimper, showing patience and a friendly demeanor toward the droid.
Chooses to keep manual control of the ship despite Artoo's suggestion, showing confidence and decisiveness.
Decides to proceed with landing on Dagobah despite lack of clear sensor readings; remains calm and reassures Artoo.
Acknowledges danger and difficulty of landing under heavy cloud cover and failing sensors but attempts the landing anyway.
Shows nervousness about unknown factors on the planet but maintains focus on task.
Successfully pilots and lands his X-wing on the foggy, invisible surface of Dagobah,
Responds quickly and responsibly by going after Artoo when the droid falls into the bog,
Holds his ignited lightsaber ready while searching the dangerous, swampy water for Artoo,
Does not immediately call for backup or consider waiting for help, choosing to search alone in a hazardous environment,
Though careful to protect Artoo and actively searches for him, Luke’s approach to dealing with the unknown threat (bog beast) appears cautious but potentially risky,
Helps Artoo to his feet and wipes mud and roots off him, showing concern for the droid's well-being.
Expresses worry aloud about the danger of coming to the swamp and his own mental state, revealing vulnerability and sincerity.
Helps Artoo after he is spit out of the water, checks if he is broken, and cleans him carefully.
Expresses doubt and confusion about the situation, questions if coming there was a bad idea and if he is going crazy.
Warms his hands before the furnace, attends to Artoo thoughtfully, shows nervousness but remains open to engaging with the strange creature.
Initially grips his lightsaber out of fear but quickly lowers it when the creature reassures him.
Sets up equipment and powers up Artoo efficiently, indicating technical skill and preparedness.
Hesitates and nervously looks around the swamp, showing uncertainty and lack of confidence in a threatening environment.
Quickly reacts to the strange voice by grabbing his lightsaber, demonstrating alertness and readiness for danger.
Puts away his weapon after hesitating and without fully understanding the reason, showing a cautious but somewhat uncertain judgment.
Puts away his weapon despite not fully understanding the reason, showing cautious trust.
Tries to keep from smiling at the creature's humor, demonstrating friendliness and tolerance.
Insists the creature put down his dinner and takes back his supplies firmly but without aggression.
Loses patience and grabs the case away when the creature takes a prized item, showing annoyance.
Puts away his weapon despite not fully understanding why, showing restraint.
Tries to keep from smiling at the creature’s cryptic remarks, maintaining composure.
Attempts to explain the situation and negotiate with the creature but loses patience when the creature mishandles his supplies.
Loses patience and forcefully grabs the supply case away from the creature instead of calmly managing the interaction.
Lets Artoo have the lamp to avoid conflict with the creature.
Tells the creature to move along, showing some impatience (fed up).
Converses calmly and respectfully with the creature despite their argument.
Instructs Artoo to stay behind to watch the camp despite Artoo's obvious distress.
Makes a decisive choice to follow the creature alone to investigate further.
Decides to follow the mysterious creature despite Artoo's protests and potential risks.
Expresses impatience and skepticism toward his host while waiting to see Yoda, yet remains polite and tries the food.
Sits patiently despite cramped, uncomfortable surroundings and unfamiliar food; shows willingness to adapt and engage
Expresses impatience and questions the creature repeatedly about seeing Yoda instead of accepting situation calmly
Expresses frustration and impatience with training and situation, saying 'Oh, I don't know what I'm doing here. We're wasting our time.'
Responds a little angrily and challenges the creature's knowledge of his father and himself.
Demonstrates eagerness and sincerity by insisting he is ready to be a Jedi and asking Ben to confirm it.
Acknowledges being reckless and looks down, showing self-awareness and humility.
Expresses confidence to Yoda, saying 'I won't fail you - I'm not afraid.'
Listens respectfully to Yoda's warnings about the dark side and remains open to learning.
Expresses concern and unease about the ominous black tree rather than recklessness.
Climbs and maneuvers actively and skillfully through difficult swamp terrain while carrying Yoda, showing physical capability and determination.
Engages thoughtfully with Yoda’s teachings about the Force, showing willingness to learn and reflect on complex spiritual concepts.
Questions the nature of the dark side and good side, indicating curiosity and desire to understand.
Shows hesitation and fear upon seeing the ominous tree and cave, saying 'There's something not right here....'
Shows hesitation and wariness before entering the dark cave, obeys Yoda's command despite fear.
Enters a dangerous cave alone, faces frightening visions without fleeing.
Enters a dangerous cave despite feeling unease and fear.
Disregards Yoda's advice to leave weapons behind and straps on weapon belt.
Uses his lightsaber effectively to sidestep and slash at an attacking Vader.
Shows wide-eyed terror and shock upon seeing the vision of his own decapitated head.
No direct action or involvement in this excerpt; remains passive while others handle the crisis.
Responds to Artoo's frantic beeping by immediately rushing to check on the X-wing.
Shows uncertainty and frustration but listens to Yoda's guidance calmly.
Shows discouragement and doubt when attempting to use the Force, expresses 'I can't. It's too big.' and 'You want the impossible.'
Shows trust and openness by listening attentively to Yoda's teachings and following his guidance despite initial disbelief.
Shows distress and worry when sensing danger to Han and Leia during Force training.
Focuses deeply on his training with Yoda but becomes unsettled when thinking of friends.
Practices levitating equipment and Artoo through the Force with increasing concentration and control.
Becomes distressed and loses control during Force training, resulting in objects and himself crashing to the ground.
Expresses concern for friends who are in pain and insists he must go to help them despite potential danger.
Acknowledges Yoda's warning and the serious consequences, showing thoughtful consideration rather than impulsiveness.
Expresses intense concern and love for his friends, feels compelled to help them despite warnings.
Promises Master Yoda to return and complete his training, showing sincerity and commitment.
Decides to abandon training to save his friends, prioritizing their well-being over personal growth.
Expresses determination to help his friends despite warnings, showing confidence and conviction.
Chooses to leave training prematurely to help friends, against advice from Yoda and Ben, risking incomplete preparation.
Promises to return and finish training, showing awareness of his responsibilities and an attempt to balance duty and emotion.
Acknowledges Ben's warning about facing Vader alone and understands the seriousness of the situation.
Nods in response to Ben's advice not to give in to hate; shows respect and sincerity.
Promises to return after facing Vader, demonstrating trustworthiness and concern for others.
Quickly acts on his decision by firing up his ship and leaving without further consultation, indicating recklessness and possible omission of others' input.
Understands the warnings about facing Vader alone and prepares to leave despite knowing the risks.
Acts decisively by starting his ship and committing to his journey after receiving cautionary advice.
Promises to return after his confrontation, showing confidence and resolve.
Struggles internally with the dilemma, indicating uncertainty and emotional turmoil.
Speaks calmly and reassuringly to Artoo, urging patience and expressing concern for friends' safety.
Maintains grim, serious facial expression while approaching Cloud City, showing inner tension but continuing mission.
Pilots his X-wing skillfully through thick clouds toward Cloud City while maintaining focus and communicating with R2-D2.
Stops Artoo from making noise to avoid detection, showing consideration and care.
Immediately rushes after Leia and others when separated, demonstrating loyalty and concern for friends.
Engages in combat quickly when attacked, focusing on survival rather than aggression or cruelty.
Holsters his gun and moves to face Vader calmly, showing confidence and eagerness rather than fear.
Engages Vader in combat despite the danger, showing determination and courage but not directly indicating warmth.
Keeps his gaze steadily on Vader despite fear, cautiously moves back to avoid aggression.
Focuses solely on combat against Vader, shows no signs of tolerance or friendliness toward his opponent in this moment.
Aggressively drives Vader back, forcing him onto defensive tactics.
Keeps his gaze steadily on Vader while crouching after rolling away from an attack.
Surprised and shaken after being disarmed and falling down stairs.
Leaps fifteen feet straight up to hang from hoses and evade danger.
Uses the Force skillfully to retrieve his fallen sword instantly and reignite it.
Moves slowly and cautiously backward away from Vader after elevator cover opens.
Controls his anger instead of giving in to hate during fight with Vader.
Presses forward against Vader despite recognizing the danger to himself.
Deactivates his sword and lowers himself into the pit after forcing Vader back, showing restraint.
Cautiously approaches reactor room, showing thoughtful and careful behavior.
Controls his anger and acts cautiously during confrontation with Vader.
Realizes he has been foolhardy and adjusts his approach.
Skillfully forces Vader back and presses the attack.
Successfully deflects multiple dangerous attacks using sword and Force despite being bloodied and bruised.
Deactivates his sword and lowers himself into the pit after losing sight of Vader, demonstrating presence of mind.
Keeps fighting despite being bloodied and bruised, tries to climb back after falling out the window.
Falls out of the window and hangs over the edge, then scrambles up despite injury.
Fights Vader courageously despite being outmatched; shows determination.
Glances at the instrument complex floating away instead of trying to save it or prevent damage.
Does not show any maliciousness or cruelty toward Vader during duel despite pain and loss of hand.
Firmly rejects Vader's offer to join the dark side despite knowing Vader is his father.
Calls out to Ben (Obi-Wan) in a moment of danger and vulnerability.
Refuses to join Vader despite overwhelming pressure and shocking revelation, showing mental resilience and moral clarity.
Quickly decides to leap from the platform into the abyss rather than joining Vader, demonstrating decisiveness under extreme stress.
Struggles to grip and hold onto the exhaust pipe and weather vane after falling, showing physical vulnerability but determination to survive.
Manages to grab onto an electronic weather vane despite slipping and powerful winds.
Fails to secure a firm hold and slips back down, risking falling.
Continuously tries calling out to Ben and Leia for help, showing presence of mind.
Lacks a visible strategy to escape or improve his precarious position on the weather vane.
Allows himself to be helped aboard the Falcon despite being battered and vulnerable.
Responds with a simple emotional acknowledgment ('Oh, Leia...') when Leia embraces him.
Hangs from the weather vane despite danger; attempts to reach the Falcon and falls into space.
Survives falling into space and is rescued by the Falcon amidst enemy fire.
Enters the cockpit battered and bloody, needing assistance from Lando, rather than independently controlling his escape.
Resting and allowing others to manage the ship following injury; does not attempt to take control despite the urgent situation.
Recognizes the proximity and threat of Vader's Star Destroyer and feels resigned to his fate, sensing emotional defeat.
Calls out to Ben (Obi-Wan) with evident pain and confusion, showing vulnerability and openness.
Enters the cockpit and looks out the window while nearly unconscious from pain and depression, indicating emotional transparency.
Appears almost unconscious with pain and depression, showing emotional and physical vulnerability.
Addresses Obi-Wan Kenobi (Ben) with a question, showing reflective thought about past guidance.
Wishes Lando good luck and expresses care for friends on comlink.
Ends communication with friendly 'Take care, you two...'.
Coordinates with Lando and Chewie via comlink, shows clear communication and planning for rendezvous after medical treatment.
Relies on others to take action (waiting for signal from Chewie, medical treatment on his hand), does not initiate action himself.
Puts his arm around Leia, showing a new bond and understanding.
Thinking about his uncertain and complicated future, while sharing a quiet moment with Leia and the droids.
